data.text:
Erik Thomas Elliott, 44, of Bangor, died tragically in a car accident on September 10th, 2017. He was born March 4, 1973 to Norbert and Diane (Anderson) Elliott.

Erik enjoyed hunting, fishing, target shooting, golfing, playing guitar, painting art and mostly spending time with his daughter, Allison.

He is survived by his daughter, Allison; parents; brother, Mark (Deann) Elliott; nieces, Amber (Corbin) Rhodes, April (Ethan Klum) Elliott; grandmother, Ardelle Elliott; many uncles, aunts, cousins and friends.

He is preceded in death by grandparents, Ernest and Elvera Anderson; grandfather, Ervin Elliott; and uncle Ronnie Anderson.
